name: CrammingTricks
0:
”Alexa, Launch Cramming Tricks”
”Alexa, Open Cramming Tricks”
”Alexa, Begin Cramming Tricks”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: cramming tricks
des:
This skill can help students to learn tricks that can be useful in exams. Tricks can be applicable in academic exams, competitive exams, govt. exams or any technical exams. This skill can also help to remember history events, important places, emperor ruling time periods or Sultan states.

Skill is simple to use, on every invocation the skill will give you new trick and it remembers which trick previously shared so you will get new trick every time. Alexa app shows trick details for the records.
Skill equipped with next, repeat or listen more instances. Basic skill functions like help, cancel and stop are available.

Note: If you found any issue or want to suggest any trick, please write in reviews of skill. We will release the update with suggested change.
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
